1.content: Who's going to fart first?
1.title: Let's start!

11.content:
Select a profile!
Profile 1:
A new member of µ's, who is gassy, playful and likes to torture your team members for fun.
Profile 2:
An outside man who is against µ's and wants to torture a member of µ's.
Profile 3:
An outside woman who is against µ's and wants to torture a member of µ's.
Profile 4:
One of the teachers in the school who wants a fart cushion.
11.title: You

choices: Josh wanted to have a go at her.
You needed to use the toilet... which is her!
You took off your pants and underwear.
1121.content:
Maki Nishikino was just walking her merry way home. Today she decided to take a different route from normal, because she wanted to explore different parts of the city. Even if she was a rich tsundere, her heart was still of a child's.
As she walked through the quieter streets of Tokyo, she realized that it was... too quiet. She started to feel like she was being watched. Scared, she closed her eyes and tried to run into the next intersection, when she bumped into something. She looked up to see you, a boy taller than her. "Lost, little angel," you smirked as you grabbed her wrists. She started to pull away, but your buddy, Josh, came from behind and arm locked her. You firmly put your hand on her mouth to prevent her from screaming. Josh pulled her into your favorite alley, where you and him hung out. He threw Maki onto the old sofa you have been using since forever, and you sat down on her face, while her arms and legs struggled wildly. "Dude, I totally needed a toilet when this chick decided to show up!" you said as...
PRAAAAABBBBBBBTTTTT!
A juicy one ripped from your butt! A few seconds later, the smell started to creep into Maki's nose. She struggled to try to get away from the eggy fumes from your ass, to no avail. You rub it in, making her smell more of your ass. She was appalled. She had never been sat on the face before, let alone farting nasty ones on her! She was getting dizzy, when...
Pooooooot!
A hot SBD slipped from your anus. It may have been quiet but the rotten smell hit her like a ton of bricks. She was already struggling weaker than before. That's when...
1121.title: Maki

114.content:
You are Mr.Mitchell, a new teacher at Otonokizaki High School. You always traveled from school to school, because your job never stuck due to you doing some... "suspicious" things at said schools. You decided to move into this school because it seemed like it would close sooner or later, due to less students enrolling. That would be good, you could disappear easily in these circumstances.
After a few days of class, you get to know most of the girls in your classes. After some time deciding, you concluded that your best target would be...
114.title: Profile 4

choices: Give in and take a deep breath.
Refuse! Time to take off those pants!
1141.content:
The familiar sound of the school bell rung through the classroom.
"Class is dismissed," you said as you saw Honoka stretching, just woken up. "Except you, Honoka," you turned to her, "We need to do something with your sleeping habit." She turned to you, shocked. "Ehhhhhhh?" she exclaimed as the other girls laughed as they all exited the classroom.
"Now, Honoka," you said as you circled around her desk, "You do realize sleeping in class is very disrespectful." "Yes, I do Mr.Mitchell, but-" "No buts!" you interrupted, "Except this one though..." You grinned as you muttered under your breath. "Now, since I am a good teacher, I will teach you a lesson," you said as you saw Honoka tense up. You walked to the teacher's desk and motioned for her to follow. She walked up to the teachers desk and... You grabbed her and pushed her down! You placed her with her head on the seat, facing the ceiling. Honoka struggled to break free, but you were stronger than her. She was just about to scream, when you turned around and sat on her head! The idol under your butt still tried to struggle against you, but it was useless. She had to smell your stinky butt. "Now, the lesson begins!" you exclaimed as...
PRRRRRBBBTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!
A loud and long fart blew against the orange girl's face! She struggled with all her might, but she couldn't break free. "Ah, those tacos were good," you teased as you rubbed it in her face. It was absolutely horrible for Honoka. It smelled even worse rotten eggs and cabbage. "Now, take a deep sniff," you ordered, "Unless you want to smell it through my underwear?" Honoka panicked. She didn't want to smell any more of this rotten gas, but would it be worth it? And would this teacher really take off his pants in the classroom? Time was running out. She decided to...
1141.title: Honoka

choices: Dragged her to a more private place
11432.content:
"Miss Nozomi!!", A lucky shot You got really considering the Ex-president's "habit" You wonder How she would like your as you two were alone in a large table room.
"Ahh Mr.Mitchell to what do I--", She started but did want to put up with her, you wanted to put her under your butt, "Don't start with me Nozomi what did I tell about gropeing others?!", "Well, I can't help but give well-deserved punishment or two", She said as if she was completely innocent, You, on the other hand, had enough.
"Punishment eh?", You then in an instant shoved you're but in her face to her surprise then...
*PRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR-BAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPT!*
A muffed yelp could be heard. "Now I hope you learned no one like to be harassed", You said.
This was only the start though as you then...
11432.title: Nozomi

12.content: Who will our busty senior let loose some gas on?
12.title: Nozomi

125.content: Who will our busty senior let loose some gas on?
125.title: More

14.content:
Welcome to the Alternate Modes section! In this section, you can choose different modes that make the members of µ's suffer to the horrible smells of gas! Right now we have a limited amount of options, but you can contribute by emailing me some more ideas!
These are the modes available:
Gang-Fart: A group of characters torture one character.
Gang-to-Gang-Fart: A group of characters fart on another group of characters.
Trap Room: A group of characters get trapped in a small space while at least one of them farts uncontrollably.
Crossover: A character from a different game/anime/manga/etc. comes to the Love Live! world and farts on one of the characters.
What will your choice be?
14.title: Other modes

143.content: A group is about to get trapped in a sealed room. What will the scenario be?
143.title: Trap Room

choices: Cotarou Deliberately Fart Tortures The Girls
It's Accidental, But He Can't Stop Farting
1431.content: It was Nico's job to babysit Cotarou today, however the girls had some important things they needed to get done that just couldn't wait. With no other option, they had to take him with them. What ever could go wrong? Unfortunately the trip involved an elevator ride, it was just a quick jaunt in a large department store, an elevator that only traveled 3 or 4 floors seemed harmless, but now it was going to be their personal hell. As the elevator moved between the upper floors there was a grinding of metal, and it came to a stop. The elevator was stuck. It seemed bad before, who knew how long it would be until they got it fixed. But it was about to get worse; Nico knew all to well the unbridled horror of Cotarou's farts, and unfortunately he was feeling very gassy.
1431.title: Cotarou's Elevator of Doom

145.content:
You are mysterious Person, a criminal who’s MO is capturing idols and tormenting them, everything about you is ambiguous except you hate of idols, give them something to sing about.

Who to hunt first?

(Non - Love Life idols are welcome)
145.title: Idol Hunter

In this interactive, you and the idols of Âµ's from Love Live! School Idol Project are going to gas each other in anyway you want, as long as it's within my rules.
I prefer:
Farting

Other than that, please add and enjoy this interactive!
info.pretty_title: Love Live! School Idol Fart Torture
